```{r echo=F, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(gridExtra)
require(ggdark)

params = read.csv("~/gsccs-data/params.csv")
tsdf = read.csv("~/gsccs-data/time-series.csv")

colors <- c("Parasite" = "purple", "Host" = "orange")

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=Nh,color="Host")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=Np,color="Parasite")) +
  labs(x = "Time",        
       y = "Global Census Size",        
       color = "Legend") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=zh,color="Host")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=zp,color="Parasite")) +
  labs(x = "Time",        
       y = "Global Trait Means",        
       color = "Legend") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=vh,color="Host")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=vp,color="Parasite")) +
  labs(x = "Time",        
       y = "Global Trait Stddevs",        
       color = "Legend") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=muh,color="Host")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=mup,color="Parasite")) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Avg Num Muts Per Indiv") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=pntcorr)) +
  labs(x = "Time",        
       y = "Spatial Correlation of Traits",        
       color = "Legend") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  ylim(c(-1,1)) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=pr_unparasitized,color="Host")) +
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=pr_unhosted,color="Parasite")) +
  labs(x = "Time",        
       y = "Unparasitized/Unhosted",        
       color = "Legend") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  ylim(c(0,1)) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=pprh_m)) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Average Parasites Per Host") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=sqrt(pprh_v))) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Stddev Parasites Per Host") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=pdm)) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Avg Parasite Dist2Host") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()

ggplot(tsdf) + 
  geom_line(aes(x=t,y=sqrt(pdv))) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Stddev Parasite Dist2Host") +   
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  dark_theme_gray()
```
